a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball III

p.k: The Oracle / The Safety / The Friend / The Saint / The Society / The Spoiler / The Countdown / The Nobody / The Downer Gumball Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joe’s mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things aren’t going Gumball’s way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society... / Gumball and Darwin want to see the scariest film of the year. / Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus. / Things keep going missing in the house so it’s up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. / Gumball refuses to get out of bed because he is in a lousy mood.
